input.description:
String Value - The name of a configuration item defined in a configuration module.
Example:BCAN

An XML document providing the data template for validation in the form.
<validation> <change-id/> <task-id/> <user-name/> <current-time/> <configuration-item/> <validate>validateChangeTaskExist,validateTaskStatusAssigned,validateTaskUser,validateTaskDate,validateTaskCI</validate> </validation>

output.description: An XML document providing the data template for single or multiple Concept elements.The change concept is an XML document containing specific elements used to assign multiple values to a single context item. Each value is associated with an element of the Concept.

String Value - Indicates whether or not the process completed successfully.
Valid values: success, failure
String Value - A process specific string that explains the value of success status.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string('${status}')='true'"> <validateChangeTaskExist> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </validateChangeTaskExist> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string('${status}')='false'"> <validateChangeTaskExist> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </validateChangeTaskExist> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string('${task status}')='Assigned'"> <validateTaskStatusAssigned> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </validateTaskStatusAssigned> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string('${task status}')!='Assigned'"> <validateTaskStatusAssigned> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </validateTaskStatusAssigned> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string('${assignee}')='${user name}'"> <validateTaskUser> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </validateTaskUser> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string('${assignee}')!='${user name}'"> <validateTaskUser> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </validateTaskUser> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="'$[current time]' >= '$[scheduled start date]' and '$[current time]' <= '$[scheduled end date]'"> <validateTaskDate> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </validateTaskDate> </xsl:when> <xsl:otherwise> <validateTaskDate> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </validateTaskDate> </xsl:otherwise> </xsl:choose> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <value> <xsl:if test="string('${task ci name}')='${configuration item name}'"> <validateTaskCI> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">0</xsl:text> </validateTaskCI> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string('${task ci name}')!='${configuration item name}'"> <validateTaskCI> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">1</xsl:text> </validateTaskCI> </xsl:if> </value> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="yes" cdata-section-elements="status " /> <xsl:variable name="change-task-exist-result">${change task exist result}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="task-status-assigned-result">${task status assigned result}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="task-user-result">${task user result}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="task-date-result">${task date result}</xsl:variable> <xsl:variable name="task-ci-result">${task ci result}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <status> <xsl:if test="string-length($change-task-exist-result) > '0'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($change-task-exist-result)/value/*" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length($task-status-assigned-result) > '0'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($task-status-assigned-result)/value/*" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length($task-user-result) > '0'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($task-user-result)/value/*" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length($task-date-result) > '0'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($task-date-result)/value/*" /> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string-length($task-ci-result) > '0'"> <xsl:copy-of select="xalan:nodeset($task-ci-result)/value/*" /> </xsl:if> </status> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: This process will enhance the validation of user provided Change and Task ID during creation of Terminal and SSH proxy jobs in BBNA.
